letters.description: Identify the client's specific stage of transition by mapping hormonal symptoms, cycle patterns, and metabolic health history.
Balance endocrine function through bio-individual nutrition, blood sugar stabilization, and cortisol-lowering lifestyle protocols.
Optimize physical health by implementing strength-based movement and metabolic conditioning to protect bone density and lean muscle.
Apply targeted interventions to mitigate vasomotor symptoms, sleep disturbances, and neurological shifts common in the perimenopausal window.
Establish a long-term roadmap for post-menopausal vitality, focusing on cardiovascular protection and sustained cognitive health.
